trans-unit.source: Abstract class that represents a keyboard device.
trans-unit.target: 表示键盘设备的抽象类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice> supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice>支持[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]基础结构，不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: For keyboard related input, use the <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> class.
trans-unit.target: 对于键盘相关输入，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> class represents the keyboard to an application and provides methods, properties, and events that reflect the state of the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>类表示键盘到应用程序，并提供方法、 属性和事件，来反映键盘的状态。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard> class delegates to the appropriate <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.Keyboard>类委托给适当<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice>。

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice> object represents one particular input device.
trans-unit.target: 每个<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice>对象表示一个特定的输入的设备。

trans-unit.source: For example, if there are two mice, there will be two <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice> objects.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果有两个鼠标，将有两个<xref:System.Windows.Input.InputDevice>对象。

trans-unit.source: The input manager associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice" /> 相关联的输入管理器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" /> that is reporting input for this device.
trans-unit.target: 获取报告此设备的输入的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.PresentationSource" />。

trans-unit.source: The source of input for this device.
trans-unit.target: 此设备的输入源。

trans-unit.source: for getting the active source.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取活动的源。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumerations: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />
trans-unit.target: 关联的枚举： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted" />

trans-unit.source: Clears focus.
trans-unit.target: 清除焦点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice.ClearFocus%2A> method sets the focus to `null`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice.ClearFocus%2A>方法将焦点设置`null`。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] when restoring focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置还原焦点时 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 的行为。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the behavior of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] when restoring focus.
trans-unit.target: 一个指定还原焦点时 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 的行为的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: The default in <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Input.RestoreFocusMode.Auto" />。

trans-unit.source: The element to move focus to.
trans-unit.target: 要将焦点移至的元素。

trans-unit.source: Sets keyboard focus on the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 对指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> 设置键盘焦点。

trans-unit.source: The element that has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 具有键盘焦点的元素。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="element" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="element" /> 不是 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Windows.ContentElement" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the element that has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取具有键盘焦点的元素。

trans-unit.source: The element with keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 具有键盘焦点的元素。

trans-unit.source: The key to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的键。

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of key states for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> 的键状态集。

trans-unit.source: The set of key states for the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 指定键的键状态集。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is not a valid key.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 不是一个有效键。

trans-unit.source: The key to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的键。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, obtains the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyStates" /> for the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" />.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.KeyStates" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" />。

trans-unit.source: The set of key states for the specified key.
trans-unit.target: 指定键的键状态集。

trans-unit.source: The key to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的键。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> is in the down state.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> 是否处于按下状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="key" /> is in the down state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="key" /> 处于按下状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is not a valid key.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 不是一个有效键。

trans-unit.source: The key to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的键。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> is in the toggled state.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> 是否处于切换状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="key" /> is in the toggled state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="key" /> 处于切换状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is not a valid key.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 不是一个有效键。

trans-unit.source: The key to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的键。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> is in the up state.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.Key" /> 是否处于松开状态。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="key" /> is in the up state; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="key" /> 处于松开状态，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="key" /> is not a valid key.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="key" /> 不是一个有效键。

trans-unit.source: Gets the set of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys" /> which are currently pressed.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前按下的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys" /> 集。

trans-unit.source: The set of modifier keys.
trans-unit.target: 修改键集。

trans-unit.source: Gets the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" /> that input from this device is sent to.
trans-unit.target: 获取将此设备的输入发送到的指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.IInputElement" />。

trans-unit.source: The element that receives input.
trans-unit.target: 接收输入的元素。

trans-unit.source: The target for a <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice> is the object that has keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 针对<xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardDevice>是具有键盘焦点的对象。
